oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Foot officer's sword
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Model 1850 foot officer's sword. Evidence of acid-etched engraving. No maker's mark. This item belonged to the family of Warner Bass. Mr. Blackman Dunn of Grassmere was killed at the Battle of Chickamauga. This sword and watch were sent home.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
